pkgmetadata.longdescription: Implementation of the 'Verhoeff' Check Digit Algorithm // An implementation of the 'Verhoeff' algorithm for calculating check digits (Verhoeff, J. (1969) doi:10.1002/zamm.19710510323). Functions are provided to calculate a check digit given an input number, calculate and append a check digit to an input number, and validate that a check digit is correct given an input number.
